PartyRoleRelation.name: PartyRoleRelation
PartyRoleRelation.description: Represents information about the type of relationship between the participants.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the party role relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the roles.

RelatedRoleName.description: The role that's related to another role in the relationship.

RelationshipObjectName.description: The object that's associated with the relationship.

RoleName.description: The name of the role in the relationship.

ShouldCreaInversRoleAuto.description: Indicates whether a role record should be created automatically for the relationship (true) or not (false).
